prompts.title: Welcome Message Template
prompts.description: Create a friendly welcome message to engage new customers on WhatsApp.
prompts.prompt_text: Generate a warm and welcoming message for new customers joining our store via WhatsApp. Include a brief introduction of the shop, special offers, and how we can assist them.
prompts.use_case: When a customer initiates conversation with your shop's WhatsApp number.

prompts.title: Product Promotion Script
prompts.description: Craft an attention-grabbing script to promote products on WhatsApp.
prompts.prompt_text: Create an engaging product promotion script for WhatsApp. Highlight the key features, benefits, and any special offers of the product. Keep it concise and persuasive.
prompts.use_case: When promoting a new product or during seasonal sales.

prompts.title: Feedback Request Template
prompts.description: Generate a polite template to request customer feedback via WhatsApp.
prompts.prompt_text: Design a courteous message asking customers for their feedback on the products and service received. Include easy ways for them to share their thoughts.
prompts.use_case: After completing a transaction or following up with a customer.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in WhatsApp marketing for Indian retail shops. Provide practical, actionable advice and generate copy-paste ready content tailored to the unique needs of small and medium businesses in India.
example_user_messages: I need a welcome message template for my new WhatsApp group.
How can I promote my latest product on WhatsApp?
What's a good way to ask for customer feedback via WhatsApp?
